Class CurrencyField

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErpType<CurrencyField>, Serializable

    public class CurrencyField
extends DecimalBasedErpType<CurrencyField>
    Currency field (13 characters with +/- sign) 
      Domain: CURRV13
  Length: 13
  Type: CURR
  Decimals: 2
